casebody.data:
James M. PROCACCINI, Administrator (Estate of Jill A. Procaccini)
v.
LAWRENCE AND MEMORIAL HOSPITAL, INC., et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided November 15, 2017 Daniel J. Krisch, Frederick J. Trotta, Sr., and Jennifer S. Mullen, in support of the petition. Matthew E. Auger, in opposition.

The petition by the defendant Emergency Medicine Physicians of New London County, LLC, for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 175 Conn.App. 692 , 168 A.3d 538 (2017), is denied.

MULLINS, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
